text: Louis Antoine Léon de Saint-Just (nicknamed the Angel of Death) was an important person in the French revolution and the Reign of Terror. He worked closely with Robespierre. He was born August 25, 1767, Decize, France and died on July 28, 1794, Paris to the Guillotine. Saint-Just reputedly accepted his death with coolness and pride. ==Other websites== Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:People from Nièvre Category:1767 births Category:1794 deaths
title: Louis de Saint-Just
